title: Should Have Unique Notification Sound
text: The app seems to do what it is supposed to do, but it should have a unique notification sound.  This would help us users enormously, because we want to respond as quickly as possible to a motion detection notification. It is too easy to ignore notification sounds that are the same as those for, say, new email messages.  I have requested this feature of the developers, and I hope they add it soon.  An example of an app (not a home security app) that has a unique sound for its notification is the Spark email app.

title: Getting worst all the time
text:
The worst , most unreliable security system out there! Used to be good years ago when it first came out, what happened? Did they sell it to greedy morons? Used to be able to call customer service to help you with your issues, forget it now, it’s like hoping to find a UFO in the sky.  It doesn’t  record in time sequence, it skips and freezes, then I find three of the same recording instead of a new one and the alerts that someone is in the room is very late ..so much for security. 
I have a high speed internet but yet Canary keeps going off line.. WHAT ARE THEY DOING? DON’T TRUST CANARY, it’s not what it used to be anymore, do yourself a favor and get yourself another security system.

title: Just Ok
text: I have had the canary for 2 years. While I love the look of it, the app is terrible.  If and when I can actually see the live footage, I do get a nice clear picture.  Every update to the app has gotten worse and worse.  Large chunks of time end up missing from the recordings. It is not compatible with the new ios13 update and it crashes constantly. It’s not my phone - I have the iPhone XR. And I’ve tried rebooting both my phone and the camera, deleting and reinstalling the app, and it still does not work like it should. If they could fix the issues with the app, then this camera would be worth buying. As of right now, I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.

title: Bait and Switch ...
text: Two way talk is a feature that is standard on all other cameras such as Nest. Was never stated that this feature would be "part of the subscription" when I bought the product. I assumed that it was a standard feature that would be released in a update. Took too long to come out with the update for this feature and wrong approach making it part of the subscription. They did an update and made home mode and night mode recording part of the membership and they shorten the recordings as well... doesn't fully record the movement ... it missed a person walking through a door ...how do you expect to gain Customer loyalty with those moves? buy a camera from a trustworthy company... not this one.......

title: Recordings.
text:
The whole issue the I am having is that the system doesn’t take the video that is is supposed to. Example, if a car is driving by, my system will automatically record after nearly it has passed the frame.
I honestly think you guys need to do 30 second time intervals or something like that to give a better recording feature. Because honestly I am missing out on so much of what is going on around my house that should have been recorded. 
Please update this feature on the recording where it records the whole motion. Not just after something is sensed and the system thinks about if it is worth recording or not. 
It’s just irritating.

title: Good but could be better
text: I love this camera it’s not to big and it’s not very noticeable when you have it on a table or with everyday things so nobody else knows what it is. The only thing I really hate about this is the notifications go off every 5 minutes and sometimes when I turn it on to record it doesn’t come out of the home mode. I will not be paying 9.99 for the service but if they would fix a few things wrong with this app I would willingly pay for the monthly service. The picture quality is great I like the fact that you can see everything and it sends it to my phone.

title: Videos freezing
text: The videos are freezing up in the last few months since recent updates to the app. We have had our camera for awhile and had no issues until recently. Now we have periods within the videos where is freezes and starts again. Playback is also freezing. Have to get out of the app and reopen to correct it until it happens again. Major safety concern. Otherwise the quality of the cameras are great and the notifications are great. Very sensitive to motion if you set the motion settings correctly.

title: Yes!!!!!...It’s back and I Love My Canary Once Again
text:
Thank You Canary!...I’m glad you didn’t let us down...forget about my Previous review You Rock Now!

Hate the Upgrade!
I now have to purchase another Security In 
order for it to do what I need it to do..I wish I could take this one back...it serves no purpose to me now...Why would you keep us from controlling our own security?...Is it to make more money?..I want the option of recording whenever I need it to...Please give that option BACK!..don’t forget..its about the customer

title: I LOVE CANARY
text: These cameras are awesome. I can’t say enough about them. Yeah the company pulled a few features while they were optimizing their cloud or whatever but now all those features are back for those non paid users. I have a membership and I NEVER lost those features. I have 4 cameras. Two inside and 2 out. All the bad reviews are about the company not the product so don’t listen to much. Find out for yourselves how amazing these products are and what great customer service they have. Keep up the good work Canary.

title: The boy who called wolf
text:
It's the story if this device. The boy is well constructed and perhaps means well but when there is no way to modify or issue a more constructive learning and adaptive warning. When the wolf does arrive, no one will respond. 
Moral: let us, the user, have more access and modifiable feature when it comes to sensitivity level. Once the machine is more tweaked, auto siren might be a possible feature. But for now, let's first fixed the obvious intrinsic issue of the canary does not know when the movement is based on native application of "night vision".

title: Outrageous changes
text: I purchased my very expensive Canary device three years ago under the expectation I'd be able to utilize the device to record activity in my apartment (ya know, sorta what cameras are used for). Three years later Canary has decided to charge an absurd amount of money for those same services that used to be free without grandfathering any user in. Imagine what other changes they're going to make in attempt to gouge our pockets and render their product into a useless black chunk of plastic. Extremely disappointed in the response I got from customer service when I asked them to explain their reasoning for making these changes, as well. They just told me to look at the FAQ page. I wouldn't recommend this product.

title: $9.99 Per Month Admission Fee
text: In my opinion, anything remotely useful will now cost you $9.99 per month. My experience, thus far, has been a continual downgrade in functionality with promises to restore previous functionality by paying $100 a year. This $100 will not give you the choice to store anything other than what this single expensive paperweight can see or hear. I could have bought a cheaper NetCam with the ability to choose my own storage location. I did not buy another popular company’s device because of the high monthly service fee for basic functionality. However, at least they were up front about it. I got suckered into this one because I believed Canary. Do not trust this company and their promises.

title: Not very good yet, but hopeful for the future
text: Overall, you should realize this product is basically a paid alpha product. If you go in with this expectation, you will be ready for all the bugs and rough spots in the product. There is every reason to expect the product will improve over time, but for the moment it's an overpriced and unreliable wifi webcam with a siren.  Setup was a huge pain and required support intervention to complete.  Most disappointing is that they advertise no contracts but they don't save any video unless you play for a storage plan. Notifications don't work at all either on my 6+ or my wife's 6.

title: Poor Image Quality
text:
The most important factor from a security camera would be the image quality.   Purchased my first camera yesterday, installed it today.  Cars parked in front of my house maybe 30 feet away seem pixelated, and license plates are a complete blur.  Only offers decent quality up to maybe 10 feet.  I have it wired to run plugged in which I thought would help with image quality.  

Setup was simplistic.  Signed up for the Premium Membership, for $9.99/mo.  Only offer 12 hours of playback on the app without membership.  

Overall, I’m not completely sold on it.   The price point at $119 was doable compared to other models  that run twice if not triple.

title: A satisfactory product that has been neutered
text:
I originally left a 5 star review for this app, and I have now changed my mind.
Canary removed some of the best features for everyone except paid members, including night mode. Because of that I did not get any notification or video of my car being broken in to. I’ve spent $400 on canary products and now I’m expected to pay a membership fee to make it half useful? You should be ashamed of your business strategy... removing useful features that were previously available just for buying your expensive hardware are now “premium” features requiring membership.
These do not work nearly reliably enough to command a monthly/yearly subscription that rivals a full on home security system.

If you like me are stuck with these things and wish to recoup some of your lost features, there are promo codes on the web for half off a membership. 
Pitiful business model and customer experience. 
By the way, the company I work for sells Canary as well as Arlo. Since launch I’ve sold a couple dozen Canaries; but I will be demo-ing Arlo in the future.

title: Nice hardware, nice UI, but has issues
text: I have two in my house and they're very well designed — they're beautiful! The UI is also well designed. But it seems like each week I'm troubleshooting it. Today, both were unresponsive and the light was on, as if it were recording me at home. I unplugged them since it was creepy and wouldn't stop. It was an hour before the app notified me that they were off. Motion alerts are slow to arrive too, and looking back and video often times leads to error. Between the mysterious blinking on the cameras and the unreliability of the software, I think I've had enough.

title: Storage Misrepresented
text:
When I purchased these devices (2) through Verizon, I was told that I didn't need to buy storage, that I'd be given 2GB of storage. In other words, no need to subscribe monthly, or otherwise. I ASKED TJIS SPECIFICALLY UPON PURCHASE!  I returned home, set up and the "armed" feed was showing up, but disappearing after two days. I called and was told I needed to purchase the data monthly for $9.99. Subsequently, during that call, about a week after purchase, the two-day feed limit dropped to one - ¡while I was on the phone with them!
I have other issues with Canary, but the misrepresentation by the sales assOciate really ticks me off. Oh, the reason for two stars: the high res. camera is great.

title: Solid device
text: This device does what it is supposed to do. Those complaining about lag probably need to upgrade their network hardware. I have it connected to a 5g wireless setup and I have around a 5-7 second delay. I'm not sure that any technology can do any better at this time. If you want peace of mind without having to install a bunch of sensors and wiring. This is the best option imho. The only thing I would like to see available is 2 way communication. Anxious to try out their new outdoor camera.

title: Latest Update ruined customer experience/product
text:
I don't normally right reviews. Been a Canary owner since day one, but the new software rendered this product virtually useless. I can't set up emergency numbers, it freezes. I can no longer manually record an event, so Canary only captures beginning and end. The app often times cannot connect to Canary, home health will not load more often than not. Even the timeline doesn't load correctly. All this occurred after I paid for a storage membership, ugh. Also, they need to allow users to turn off the ridiculous lights which do nothing other than draw attention to an alert intruder.

Used to be good, no chance I would buy again now; too many other viable competitors.

title: On the way...
text:
Okay after seeing all the negative reviews wanted to chime in to support a device with great potential.

My experience was like others, offline issues, restart issues, etc.  These issues have significantly improved over the past week or two.

That said, this product is still new and still in need of refinement.  Would I use it as the exclusive security system for my house now?  NO.  But I purchased it figuring that there would be a bake in period where the device would be refined. 

So I think it is great has great potential and is allowing me to keep up on my home way better then a webcam could.  At some point in the not too distant future I'm hopeful it will replace my alarm but for today I'm happy with what it does and looking forward to seeing it get better.

Keep on the right track and I could easily see myself by a few more of these for additional coverage.

title: 2 + weeks and still a brick
text:
So disappointed in Canary and their platform.  I have a couple other cameras I have purchased since I purchased my Canary a few years ago that are consistently much more stable and reliable than my Canary.  This app has been updated a couple times since the video playback feature flaked out a couple of weeks ago and still has not resolved the problem.  
I am to the point I’m ready to throw this camera in the trash which might make the developers happy since I refuse to be held hostage to their paid subscription when there are certainly better options that seem more vested in development of their product line.

title: Not consistent
text: Picture quality is fine. Doesnt record the videos 24/7 but you can watch it 24/7, it only records the videos for motion, or people in your house. I just had an experience where everything is set to get me notified and for all motions too. The most important thing that I had to captured didn't get captured. And the person I was trying to get captured walk right infront of my canary but didnt record it, and didnt even send me notification. The stranger walk back and forth my house but didnt record it even once. Even when the guy start parking on my spot wasnt captured.  Smh for this camera Im so disappointed

title: Recent events in August 2019
text:
As of August 26, 2019, access to the cameras has become near impossible.
I’m unable to access live or monitor feeds.
The system doesn’t toggle on. It appears it does but if you log back in the app will reset to its default off setting.
As expected, alerts / notifications are no longer functional and no longer send app notifications. Because I never trust any single system I’m still getting notifications from my backup but so many point of failures from Canary is poor app development testing and customer service. No email or update was sent to explain the several ongoing issues. 
Btw I’ve uninstalled n reinstalled app.
Disconnected n reconnected the devices.
And turned my phone off and back on.
I would  NOT recommend Canary hardware and associated support software and customer service. I realize mistakes are made but lack of communications for a security platform is not acceptable. 
Considering price point this type massive failure shouldn’t happen. People, families rely on the Canary team.

title: Great product just a few tweaks
text: So far I love my canary. It's awesome to be able to watch my dog while I'm away. However, it would be nice if the system notified you when its armed and disarmed. I have to check to make sure it armed when leaving. I think the system should notify you if the power was lost or unplugged. I have intermittent times when the system won't notify me of motion. The Air quality is nice but it doesn't tell you exactly why the air is abnormal. It just lists reasons why but a more specific reason would be nice.

title: The app setup is good but performance is poor
text: The app as a whole is nice however it freezes switching in between cameras. When you have multiple cameras it’s really annoying because you have to kill the app and restart it and start over. I wish they would spend more time fixing the current app and the problems with it instead of trying to roll out new products. There is no point in rolling out new products when you can’t see any of the things that you’re supposed to see with it. My ring app does not have the same problems as this canary app dropping all the time

title: Okay owhen it’s working !
text: Bought this Canary a few years ago and has given me nothing but problems since I bought it, it would loose connection frequently, and take forever to reconnect. I reached out to CS on a few occasions and  waited forever to hear back and the issue was never resolved, meanwhile I recently got a new debit card and my monthly “premium service” payment was declined, they immediately emailed, and texted my phone a few times to let me know. I have recently replaced it with a Nest outdoor camera, and it has been working great. And it doesn’t cost me $10 a month for two-way talk that is very distorted. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this product.

title: Canary cameras
text: Hi I have been using them for over a year now I have 5 hooked up around home in and out side. I see WiFi 2.4 is better to use .in the beginning I had Comcast xfinity WiFi always had problems as soon as I got Verizon Fios WiFi cameras works a lot better you must have good WiFi and a clear Signal path no metal objects blocking the path you be amazed what blocks the path of the Wi-Fi. The app also has been fine tuned by canary I feel at this time I am well experienced in the use of Canary cameras.

title: Two Home Coverage
text: Set up my first home monitor three years ago and added another when we bought a second home. Key is setting up the modes you want and understand the lights when updating out of line due to WiFi issue (power loss). Able to monitor maintenance service access and checks by family. False reports controlled by use of blanking fields for fans or car lights through door windows.

title: A few issues to start out But was handled by Matt in customer service.
text:
I had a bumpy road at first with system and service but Matt in customer service went above and beyond my expectations. 
Matt really helped me out and fixed everything for me. I first had some issues And tried and tried to get help with my camera system with a little help but Matt saved the day. What I like about this is  System is it has audio and video.

title: Not perfect; needs a lot of work
text: This camera works fine, but the app is tiresome. It switches to night mode too early and doesn't switch back at the right time so I'm constantly getting alerts. Also, the schedule for night mode doesn't stick. I can change it to a certain time, save, and go back to it immediately and the time is different. Totally unacceptable. Since the problem is clearly something that can be fixed with a little development, I'm going to hold out hope that it will be fixed soon. I'm pretty sure even the dumbest of developers can figure this one out.

title: Good camera no in app purchase
text: I like the canary camera, great price, but I have to pay to use the push to talk option. I don’t mind paying reasonable fee, but I am tired of giving out my card info to too many service providers. Hence in app purchase from one place, one site, and one company that I can hold responsible if my info is compromised. That being said canary is willing to give 50% of the entire years service discount via email but not willing to pay Apple 15-30%. Baffling. I just got arlo pro and I don’t have to pay for push to talk feature. Btw The app is great just can’t use most of its features.

title: Used to work great, completely unresponsive now
text:
Doesn’t record properly, misses the actual action we want to see. It’ll record my cat running through the house, but doesn’t catch my grandma walking out the house naked. I can’t even check it from my phone anymore. The app freezes and never opens. Just the beach ball of death and I have to close the app. Very frustrating. I just stopped using it because it never works. I used to love Canary, and now I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone. Please improve the app. I have an iPhoneX running the latest version of Canary, yet it never works.

My family pays for a subscription so we are essentially wasting our money. Looking for a replacement. I used to be an avid fan. 😔

title: Works well. App is stable.
text:
We've had our canaries for about 6-months now, and bought the subscription. The system works well and the app has been stable. We have Internet through Comcast and have a fast upload connection. I’m sure that helps.

Love how the system arms itself when everyone's cell phones leave the house. We do get some false alarms with the dog, but the system seems to be learning as we tag him in the videos. Very happy with our purchase.

title: Great product.
text: Have not downloaded this version yet however in my opinion this is without a doubt the finest security product on the market today. I have purchased seven, I currently have the Flex set up and the Canary, one still in box, four given to my son and other family members. When I first got it the next week I was in San Francisco watching everything at my house. I have also caught stepson’s girlfriend snooping in my drawer’s and removing items from my home. Busted!!! Not invited back.

title: Shady business. Using software updates to remove features they sold their cameras on
text:
The product works fine enough. But I’d never recommend this product again. Any company that sells something based on a feature and then pulls said feature or hides it behind a pay wall asking for money will never get my business again. Think about it...someone said somewhere, “I don’t care that the record feature is on the back of the box and our promotional materials, make them pay more to use it!”

Shady shady shady. 

Don’t buy this camera, and try not to use their apps. Returning the one canary that I can, getting new cameras for the baby’s room, and will be trying to sell old canary system.

title: App crashes with iPhone 7 plus fix
text: Installed my new Canary on my iPhone 7 Plus and initially it started fine then would crash whenever trying to load the app. Found that if you delete and reinstall it seems to start working correctly again.  Other than that it seems to work okay. This is not a high performance security system that's professionally monitored so don't expect that. But it does have a nice camera and works well just to keep an eye on pets or if you live in an apartment making sure the maintenance men aren't doing anything crazy in your place while your at work.

title: Great product
text:
Amazing product!!!! It adds a level of security to my home and also allows me to keep tabs on my dog while I'm at the office.

The sound an alarm feature is cool although luckily have not had the need for you using it yet. The onboarding is really simple which really speaks to ease of use.

It would be awesome to see even more data and measurements in future versions. Just like the graphs provided for temperature and air quality those of would be great things to see in the app.

title: Excellent device and app
text: Works as advertised, customer service via email has been responsive as more features roll out canary will become even better.  There is nothing like it in the market place, the air sensors are very useful.  I would like more control over the base settings to re establish air quality and would be nice to be able to reset wifi connection remotely and control parameters for when camera switches from day to night vision. Keep up the good work

title: Good to go
text: My Canary has worked wonders. I can save videos by bookmarking them and still review the video years later. Its motion detection is spot on and the sound and video is crisp and easily understood. The two way communication has been fun to do, especially when I want to talk with the kids. It’s an easy plug and play device. You don’t need experience just follow the easy setup directions and have an outlet nearby. Highly recommend.

title: You’ll never stop paying
text: Canary changed the rules since I bought it two years ago, and it’s bad. Now, you have to pay them for a subscription or the security cameras will turn off after 30 seconds, even if someone is breaking into your house! They don’t care, they want your money. This kind of security isn’t secure. It doesn’t matter that you already paid for Canary and it was expensive. Imagine buying a car, and two years after you pay it off, your car would stop running after 30 seconds if you don’t pay the dealer for a subscription. This is corporate greed, pure and simple. If you don’t pay their subscription you won’t be safe. The mafia is more fair than this.

title: From good to total junk
text:
Loved this device and how it worked until they updated the recording to limit it without a paid plan and updated the app to barely function.

The app constantly uses my location and has failed to switch from away to home since the update. When I’m away, if I get a notification of motion, it won’t even load the video. I get a stuck screen with a spinning loading wheel. 

It’s no longer functioning properly at all and the change to a stingy non recording policy without a paid subscription, I can no longer recommend this to business owners or friends. Extremely disappointed and do not recommend anyone purchase a Canary any longer.

title: They broke their own app
text:
App is still broken on 12 pro max. 

Can’t access device settings. I spent a weeks communicating with their support team and they were clueless. I don’t think they test or use their own products. Also, there’s no Apple home kit support. When I first purchased years ago, they said that they would support it, but never did. Sadly I purchased more devices. I do not recommend these. Hardware is great, but the service is poor. I have 5 devices and may cancel my subscription. Just need to find a reasonable replacement. Lastly, I think a lot of services that I had under the free option was moved to the subscription at some point.

title: Buy something else
text: I’ve owned the canary system for several years.  When they first came out they were awesome but after about six months they started losing wifi connection now it happens frequently.   You get notifications every time they lose connection.  Canary is almost impossible to get help from. I had a problem with one of the cameras and everything correspondence had to be via email.  No phone calls. It took a month of emails from them to get it resolved.  NO WAY I would trust their monitoring service.   Looking for a new system now. This is old technology that canary doesn’t seem to want to improve.   Just sayin.

title: Bad product and support
text: Camera loses connectivity too often. When the internet goes out you must unplug and plug the device back in to get it back on line. This was purchased for my as a Christmas present along with my two brothers. We all have the same issues. When it works it’s great. However ever one I know who has this agrees it is not reliable. Save yourself the head ache and don’t waist your time. Canary support is of no help and will blame your service provider. I canceled my internet provider and still had issues with my never provider.  I purchased Arlo device and it stays connected 24/7. This tells me it is their product and not my isp. Save your time and chose a different product.

title: Stay Away
text: Frustrating experience all around. The bait and switch with the unexpected changes to the free plan, the fact that my camera does not work in the cold although advertised to work to -4 degrees and it is 32 degrees, the customer service that just ignores your questions and pleas. We’ve had our 5 cameras for over a year but will be asking to return them. The only times we needed our footage the camera was not recording, just not working, and sometimes it was so slow it just recorded the person of interest as they had left and their face no longer visible. We will go to arbitration or a class action lawsuit if we need to to see if we can get them to treat their customers honorably.

title: Horrible. Artists of the “Bait and Switch”
text: My family and I bought a Canary all in one last year to act as a baby monitor. It was fantastic. We ended up getting a Canary Flex upon its release. Didn’t end up getting the yearly membership as all the features we needed already came free. They did continue to offer some cool features but not enough to justify the yearly membership. Then, Oct hit and Canary decided to remove ALL its basic features unless you paid $150. No negotiation. It’s useless now. All of the features originally offered that were even called out as “Free without any membership required” are now paid for. We are returning both cameras and will never buy another product from them again.

title: Love my Canary
text: I've had nothing but a good experience with my Canary system. I'm seeing all these negative reviews but I can say that I'm perfectly happy with mine. I travel for work and am gone 3-4 days each week. Canary has been a great investment. Helps me keep peace of mind when it comes to my apartment and me not being there. I've had my apartment's maintenance team work on my place while I'm away and Canary notifies me instantly when they enter my home. No long delay in the video feed. Overall, I love my Canary.

title: Unstable!!
text: This app has been unstable from the word go a couple years ago, but now for the past few days it is continuously telling me that my canary is off line... It clearly is not off-line, I am receiving updates whenever it detects motion, but it will not allow me to access the live view. If you guys think that you got your problems taken care of from the past few days, believe me, you have not. There are still continuous connectivity problems, if you expect me to renew my subscription, get on it. Very dissatisfied.

title: App does not consistently work
text:
The app is obviously required to use their hardware but it is unfortunately worthless. It loads up just fine but when I click the Watch Live button the app crashes 4 out of 5 times. If you watch for more than 5 or so minutes the video freezes and must be relaunched taking 4 to 5 attempts due to the previous issue mentioned. I am on the current iPad and iPhone models too, so resources are not an issue. 

The rest of my complaints stem from the normal features that other camera companies make free require a paid subscription from Canary which is a higher price than services from other companies.

title: Poor customer support
text: I have contacted customer support multiple times over the past month with the same result, they stop replying to my emails. I have 6 canary devices (which to this point I regret buying as I would chose a different company such as Ring). One of my flex devices will no longer find the network. It will pair to the phone but no network options come up. Very frustrated with their lack of guidance on how to resolve this issue. And if this issue does not have a resolution than I am even more frustrated with the product quality as this device is under 3 years old. Go with a different company and save yourself the hassle.

title: Canary surveillance camera
text: I agree with a lot of others I bought this for my dogs so when I’m at work I could see what they’re up to for six months worked great after that had issues could not get the at home status to work went to their customer service let them know what I was having trouble with no response it said that they had issues and they were working on it at one time when it was free for a trial period it was working great since I started paying for the service I’ve had nothing but issues would not recommend this product to anybody I hope you all get your act together it was a great idea poor technology on your part👎👎 Two thumbs down.

title: Pretty useless
text: Almost no setting options for example it plays. Loud sound when ever I goes offline and another when it comes back online so here I am awake again at 2 am and there no way to silence that notification- and it’s the unit making that sound! It also plays a loud sound when the air quality is “abnormal” but it won’t tell me how it’s abnormal- the house can be closed up or I can have every window open and my air is randomly “abnormal”.   When it detects motion it’s often after the motion has ended.  I could walk through the room and it starts recording not when I enter or move through the room but after I’ve left the room.  Really sorry I wasted money on this

title: Getting Frustrated
text: I was so excited to open this gift for my wedding and even more excited to set it up. However, it's been 2 days now and I still can't even activate my device. The setup is taking me in circles and just when I think I'm making progress it tells me the server is unavailable or for whatever reason the app can't support my request at the time.  I guess I'll just try again tomorrow?? But the most frustrating thing is that the customer service is even worse. Not one of my emails has been responded to yet.  This app is incredibly flawed, they're network must not have enough bandwidth to support all of its users or something.  So far this device has been useless.

title: Used to be good..
text: I'm an integrator and liked the original Canary cameras when they came out I kept them in my home (over more expensive elaborate systems). However, this past month the software has gone to hell. The geofencing isn't working causing the cameras to constantly turn on and record while we're home. Even when I turn "privacy" on it turns off within a minute. Other settings are no longer stable too. Only reason i'm giving it 2 stars is because it used to be a GREAT camera system. Too bad Canary because I was just about to purchase several of your outdoor cameras. Also, forget me recommending them to my customers..

title: Sneakiest company ever
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given. The cameras work fine, but this is the sneakiest company ever! 

First, I signed up and paid for video history, but when it came time to go into my history the company told me sorry, but it wasn’t turned on. I didn’t realize that if I pay for something I would also have to dig through the app to turn on what I’ve paid for, and for each individual camera.

The one support question I had this year never got a response on the phones despite leaving a message. Ok it happens. 

When it came time to move and get rid of my cameras, guess what - they didn’t close my account for 2 months despite repeated assurances in writing and on the phone it would be taken care. Thank goodness I checked my credit card statement because they charged me $99 with no email notices or communication whatsoever. I’m sure it will end up being another “error”. 

Avoid people who do business this way - I will never go back.

title: Unreliable Security Cameras / Services
text:
Background - I own 3 Canary’s and been a paid subscriber for 3 years. 

The Canary ecosystem is an investment compared to other home security cameras. You’re buying a $150+ camera and have to subscribe to a paid membership to gain full access to all features. That does not bother me as home security is important to my family. What bothers me is the consistent, unreliability of the Canary eco system. It flat out, does not work as advertised. We’ve missed enough important moments that we said, enough and invested in another company. If you’re going to invest your money into expensive cameras and a paid subscription, go for Nest. At least you’ll be getting what you paid for with Google.

title: Haha
text: If you want something to keep an eye out on your pets it’s ok. But for security, don’t bother. Half of the time they are offline, then back online, Then offline again. Customer service needs some help as well. I really wanted to like Canary, but have been very disappointed. When I bought them, you could do everything with them, then they slowly started taking away all functionality unless you subscribe. So I did and still not that reliable. So I cancelled, and not they are pretty useless. Today all three of my devices are offline. I’ve tried restarting them and one came back, only to go back offline 15 mins later. They are more work than they are useful! :(

title: All of a sudden unable to pair...or use
text:
Not sure what happened, but both of my Canary cameras have gone offline. I’ve tried to re-pair them, but it tells me to check my Bluetooth connection. My WiFi is working fine and my password was entered correctly. The app just stalls out and I have to force it closed, which is when I see the Bluetooth message. 
 I’ve had them for quite some time now and have had some brief connectivity issues, but this is going on 2 days now. I have two Nest cams that work far more reliably and I almost regret going with Canary with all the bugs.
Good thing I’m not paying for service!
Is anyone else experiencing this issue?
Please fix whatever this issue is!

title: Returning after day one
text: I have four different security cameras in my home. Each supports two way talk for free. Canary is the only one that does not. It also stated they would give me a 30 day free trial to their service. I didn’t click on this at start and then could never find the option only 20 minutes later. Just like a previous reviewer I too sell security cameras daily and make recommendations. What a huge disappointment. I actually purchased two, one for me and the other for my father for his birthday. I’ll be returning both tomorrow morning. Canary, you must do market research before making drastic changes that affect your established customers. That’s terrible service and you know it. Shame.

title: Improvements with firmware 5.0
text:
My devices have been on fw5.0 for a month, and I have noticed much better person detection, and shorter (within 15 seconds) notification delay. This is what Canary should have been a year or two ago. Unfortunately, no improvement to video quality.

Recent app updates also seem to smooth out rough edges, but I really want to see better UI, more capable filter/search. 
I hope this is just the start of a new chapter under the new ownership. Keep up the good works!

title: Bait & Switch
text: How can you buy a product (which at the time cost ~$200) because of a certain set of features and then have these features REMOVED by a software update 6 months later, and then try to force your users to pay for them? It’s not our fault your business model wasn’t worked out correctly, we purchased a product because of what we were promised and you have stripped this out to the point where it’s effectively useless unless you have a subscription. In fact the product decryption STILL says ‘view 24hr recordings’ but be warned that is a blatant lie. Customer service also never replied. Will never give Canary money or buy another product out of principle.

title: So mad that I have three of these cameras
text: So I bought one camera when it first came out and the app worked awesome then. When my daughter wanted to play outside I could turn the camera so I could see her while she played outside on my phone. It would stream without buffering. It could tiring though turning it around so we went ahead and bought two more for our home. They worked great until they updated the app around may or June this year. Now it takes forever for the live feed to load and it doesn't stream continuously anymore. Pretty much useless for keeping an eye on my daughter now. So glad I have spent $$$ on worthless cameras since I can't access the feed like I used to.

title: Great Product, horrible app
text: I love the camera itself and its really been a great tool at home to watch the dogs, but the app has recently been pretty useless. It crashes about half the time I try to use it and watch live is hit or miss. Our home internet speed is 50 Mbps and works well with wireless, Netflix etc so it seems to just be the app from what I've noticed. If the app was more stable it would be a great all around package and a no brainer to get. It still works but is more frustrating trying it on my phone or my wife's phone to see which works at that particular time.

title: If Apple did security...
text: I'm not someone who is interested in clunky home security so I found Canary to be a very appealing alternative. The hardware looks and feels great straight out of the packaging and setting it all up was totally seamless (a nice surprise) and took under 15 minutes. Not too bad! I love how the app makes all the features immediately accessible and sends alerts when I want them. It's pretty fun to keep track of temperature and humidity as well. Though I might need a dehumidifier next...

title: Problems
text: Up until may 9th I loved Canary on that date I noticed had started to not recognize my husband when he was home. Then it did not recognize when I was away which was a bigger problem because it operated in home mode when I was away. I tried putting in away mode but it would switch back in the morning. I have had dozens of chats with the help guys we have done all the things they have suggested numerious times I have check the address and geofencing  but nothing works. I am about to switch my system. I can’t believe they can’t fix this.

title: Good luck actually getting to see video
text: This app is the worst! No matter how good my signal is, this app is always glitchy and takes forever to load.  And then no recordings are taking place when they are supposed to and I will have a huge gap in time missing for footage.  I have two canary devices and one of them is never able to properly switch to night vision  no matter the trouble shooting I do.  This device and system has been the worst security system and investment.  My Ring doorbell security system surpasses this one.  I just wish Ring made cameras for inside and I would replace canary.  The performance of the app and equipment make me so glad I didn’t purchase a membership!

title: Deserves low rating
text:
The cameras are clearly nicely designed devices but the app to control them navigates terribly. When the cameras do work they help us identify trigger moments and it has done wonders in improving her quality of life and therefore my entire family’s SANITY!!! However, when the cameras do not work, they’re as useless as setting up a can of fruit on WiFi. 

Please fix so we can all get back on board with your product.

title: Love the Live Feed
text: I've had my Canary for about a month now, and I love it. I have 2 dogs that are left at home by themselves while my fiancé and I are at work all day, so it's nice to be able to watch the live feed and make sure everything is going okay. I also like the fact that it auto-arms itself when I leave the house. I'm often forgetful, and would forget to arm a typical security system, so knowing that it does it automatically is great. Highly recommend!!

title: Getting frustrated
text: I’ve had my two canary cameras for years. One is on Ethernet and the other on wifi. Both of them show offline though the internet is up and working great. The temperatures used to work and now it seems like it’s all slowly failing. I love the siren feature, which is why I keep this, but it’s very unreliable now, and customer service is impossible to reach- you have to email. So dumb. Get it together! (update: received a response from Canary telling me to use chat and phone assistance. Problem is that you can’t get them after hours. Email took days)

title: Great for what we need
text: We've never had any home surveillance as we've always lived in tiny apts. recently moving into a bigger home we got our hands on a canary. At the moment we use it more as a baby monitor but the usability is far reaching!  I've loved being able to check on my home and baby girl while I'm at work or during the night. Brings lots of peace of mind. Helps me feel connected to what's going on at home too. Thanks!  Keep making those updates I'm sure it's just going to get better and better.

title: I'm impressed
text: For me this system works flawlessly! The setup was such a breeze that I was wondering if I had skipped a few steps! I added my wife and set up the night mode schedule. I like how seamlessly it works in the background. It auto arms and disarms, it automatically switches to night mode, and it sends me notifications to both my iPhone and Apple Watch. I simply continue to live my life as I normally would and Canary fits into my schedule! Live it! Plus the peace of mind is priceless!

title: My first review and it's bad.
text: I usually don't write reviews on apps. I'm relatively patient when it comes to them being slow or not working, but this app is seriously bad! Not only is it automatically switching back to "private" on both home and away (even though I've switched to record multiple time), when I finally do get it to the option of "watch live" it freezes up and then ultimately switches back to "private". In addition, the interface is horrible and needs a way better customer experience. I paid a decent amount for the canary piece of hardware so we expect it to actually work. Canary developers and PM, contact me and I'll gladly help you actually make this a good app.

title: Fix the App!!
text: The camera itself is fantastic and is crystal clear with great sound and video quality. I love how sleek and modern it looks and that it fits right in with my decor. I would give the camera itself  a 4-5 star rating. The reason I bought this was so I could monitor my house and dogs while I was away. Sadly, the app that goes along with the camera is TERRIBLE. It crashes about 9/10 times I open it. Even during installation it kept crashing. I have to close and restart about 5 times before I can attempt to even click on anything in the app. The app needs to be fixed or I'm moving to a more reliable device.

title: So So -- Hope Company Doesn't Go Out of Business
text: Have had three canaries for about a month now. Getting a number of alerts from pet activity. The "learning" function doesn't seem to work as of now, so can't "train" canary. Also getting false alerts every time the cameras change mode from privacy to armed. Customer support is not good. The only way to make contact is by email and support seems to reply only as they want to. Probably should've waited on this purchase. Hopefully the company will not go out of business, and the product will improve.

title: Works better with a clearer understanding
text: I was constantly getting disconnected until I realized I was better off connecting it straight to my internet box with an Ethernet chord. title: Great device extremely poor UI
text: Buttons that don’t work. Very little controls. A premium membership for everything. Constantly have to close the app because a loading screen doesn’t ever go away. title: App works ok but they removed functionality to force membership

title: Scam

title: New membership requirements make this useless

title: So, so

title: Great app! Camera is very nice!

title: Not worth it.

title: A Bad Idea and Waste of Money

title: Worst camera system ever
text: Getting my money back. This system is trash. I’ve only had it a day and the app all of a sudden wouldn’t load. title: Sell you the product then render it useless.
text: When we first bought the canary only about a year ago it was advertised as 24hr recording free and you had to pay for a membership if you wanted to be able to save the recordings for up to 30 days. title: Cool concept, needs work
text:
Great concept, but needs some work. 
The app isn't always reliable...sometimes it will say we are home when we are in fact, not (even with the auto-detection enabled). The app crashes all the time too, making it not reliable if you need to monitor the house instantly. It also doesn't send notifications if activity is detected while away. title: Criminal business model
text: Don’t get Canary and don’t pay for their premium service. title: App is garbage.
text: Videos don’t play upon request and many are “missing” in the app. The only solution for missing videos is to delete and reinstall the app which requires the user to re-setup everything again - no other company requires their users to delete their products to get them to work again. title: The 2 Star Rating is very accurate.
text:
For one, I sell this product in my retail store. I am disappointed and will probably no longer recommend it.

The hardware is amazing. Well built, sleek, strong magnet. That's why I give it two stars.

The software is trash. The app is buggy. I have a gigabit connection and average 600mbps down and 400mbps up and the live video still lags lol. You have to exit and quit the app often. The edit mask feature (where you're supposed to be able to customize the "view" of the camera) is all gray and says "No Preview Available".

I wanted to love the Canary Flex. Part of me still does. But the software will not allow me to recommend this to anybody.

title: Reliability Fixed
text:

- support has always been great (responsive and accommodating)

title: Unable to cancel subscription - auto bill every year and they won’t cancel
text:
I purchased the Canary when the major selling point was no recurring charges.  Unfortunately, they starting charging for features that were previously part of the purchase. At first I thought $99 for the account isn’t that bad, but they they started charging for each canary device.

title: Customer service is nonexistent
text: I regret ever buying these cameras. Canary is all too happy to sell you their new services and new cameras but if you have a problem you are on your own.
